DOC.brief_summary: A prospective study conducted in Japan to collect confirmatory peri-operative and 30-day information on use of the Zenith LP AAA Graft.
DOC.brief_title: Zenith Low Profile AAA Endovascular Graft (ZLP) Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Abdominal aortic, aortoiliac, and iliac aneurysms of appropriate size Vessels suitable for endovascular access and aneurysm repair Less than 20 years of age Inability or refusal to give informed consent Disease considerations that would compromise patient safety or study outcomes Unsuitable arterial anatomy
